snippet: The State Legislature on Thursday overwhelmingly passed a new version of a rainy-day fund measure for the November ballot, a bipartisan plan that seeks to smooth out the boom-and-bust cycles of state budgeting.
abstract: California State Legislature overwhelmingly passes new version of a rainy-day fund measure for the November ballot, bipartisan plan that seeks to smooth out the boom-and-bust cycles of state budgeting.
lead_paragraph: The State Legislature on Thursday overwhelmingly passed a new version of a rainy-day fund measure for the November ballot, a bipartisan plan that seeks to smooth out the boom-and-bust cycles of state budgeting.

headline.main: California: Legislators Reach Deal for New Rainy-Day Fund on Ballot
headline.print_headline: California: Legislators Reach Deal for New Rainy-Day Fund on Ballot
